heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly sunny, except partly cloudy in far northern New York. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s in southern valleys, and in the broad valleys west, mid 20s to around 30 elsewhere. Light winds east of the Green Mountains, from the south to southwest 5 to 10 mph in areas west of the Greens, and gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of wintry mix late in the St. Lawrence Valley.  Lows from the mid teens to lower 20s, rising through the 20s in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Winds becoming south 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of rain or snow showers in the northern mountains, and near the international border, with some wintry mix possible. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40 south and in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, low to mid 30s elsewhere north. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
